strapiPost.title: Rodeo Of The Ozarks Kicks Off In Springdale This Week
strapiPost.content:
Hold on to your hats because Springdale's 77th annual Rodeo of the Ozarks begins tomorrow! 

  • In the stadium: The Rodeo of the Ozarks is June 22-25 and will consist of heart-stopping entertainment acts, hilarious clowns, children's events, western lifestyle vendors, and classic carnival food. 
  • Details: Gates open at 5:30p every night, youth events begin at 6p, but expect the Grand Entry to begin at 6:30p. The stadium is at 1423 E Emma Ave just East of downtown. Tickets start at $10 for children and $15 for adults.

Check out more about the event and find tickets HERE.
